statements: SELECT * FROM patient_information WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM patient_information WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM patient_information WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, age FROM patient_information WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT name, medical_history FROM patient_information WHERE age < 25;
SELECT * FROM patient_information WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age FROM patient_information WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, age, medical_history FROM patient_information WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, medical_history FROM patient_information WHERE age < 25 OR age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_information WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT session_id, therapist_name FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT MAX(age) AS oldest_age FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, medical_history FROM patients WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT therapy_sessions.session_id, patients.name, therapy_sessions.therapist_name, therapy_sessions.session_date FROM therapy_sessions JOIN patients ON therapy_sessions.patient_id = patients.patient_id;

SELECT patients.name, COUNT(therapy_sessions.session_id) AS session_count FROM patients LEFT JOIN therapy_sessions ON patients.patient_id = therapy_sessions.patient_id GROUP BY patients.name HAVING session_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age;
SELECT name, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT session_date, session_notes FROM TherapySessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM Therapists WHERE specialization = 'Psychology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT name, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%heart%' OR medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT session_date, session_notes FROM TherapySessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name, specialization FROM Therapists ORDER BY therapist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM therapists;
SELECT name, specialty FROM therapists WHERE specialty = 'Psychology';
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT prescriptions.medication, patients.name, therapy_sessions.session_date FROM prescriptions JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN therapy_sessions ON prescriptions.patient_id = therapy_sessions.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT name, age, medical_history FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 3;

SELECT patients.name, therapy_sessions.session_date, therapists.name FROM patients JOIN therapy_sessions ON patients.patient_id = therapy_sessions.patient_id JOIN therapists ON therapy_sessions.therapist_id = therapists.therapist_id;
SELECT prescriptions.medication, patients.name FROM prescriptions JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE prescriptions.dosage = '20mg';

SELECT therapy_sessions.session_date, therapists.specialty, patients.name FROM therapy_sessions JOIN therapists ON therapy_sessions.therapist_id = therapists.therapist_id JOIN patients ON therapy_sessions.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE patients.age < 30;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions;
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_notes FROM therapy_sessions;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapists;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT med_name, med_dosage FROM medications WHERE med_dosage IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions;
SELECT session_id, patient_id, session_date FROM therapy_sessions WHERE session_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapists WHERE therapist_location = 'New York';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_type FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
